pull_requests.title: BIP158: Replace ioutil.ReadFile with os.ReadFile
pull_requests.body: Go 1.16 deprecated most of io/ioutil; os.ReadFile is the direct replacement.

pull_requests.title: BIP327: remove unused Any import
pull_requests.body: The Any type from typing was imported in bip-0327/reference.py but never used. This likely originated from copying the import header from the BIP-0340 reference, where Any is used (e.g., in pretty(v: Any)), but in BIP-0327 there is no such usage. Removing it cleans up the imports without changing behavior.
